text: Ján Koleník (born 11 November 1979) AKA Janik Janik, pôvodom Sobrančan. Zúčastňoval sa na medzinárodných súťažiach ako je bowling. He won the OTO Award for TV Male Actor for three consecutive years between 2010 and 2012. Koleník joined the Slovak National Theatre in 2004. He achieved fame in the Czech Republic for his role in the historical drama '. == Selected filmography == *Panelák (television, 2008–2014) *' (television, 2010) *' (television, 2014–2018) *Oteckovia (television, 2018–) == References == ==External links== * Category:1979 births Category:People from Banská Bystrica Category:Living people Category:Slovak male film actors Category:Slovak male stage actors Category:Slovak male television actors Category:21st-century Slovak male actors
title: Ján Koleník
